    • Method Detail

      • addFavorite

        public WrappedResponse<?> addFavorite(Long accountId,
                             Long favoritableId,
                             Enums.FavoritableType favoritableType,
                             Location location)
                               throws SirqulException
        Adds an offer, retailer location, or category to your favorites.

        Target API Endpoint: /favorite/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        favoritableId - The id of the object to favorite {offerId, offerLocationId, retailerLocationId, categoryId}
        favoritableType - The type of the object to favorite {OFFER, OFFER_LOCATION, RETAILER_LOCATION, CATEGORY}
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        On invalid response: SirqulResponse. On valid response: OFFER and OFFER_LOCATION favoirtes will return WrappedResponse<OfferResponse>, RETAILER_LOCATION favoirtes will return WrappedResponse< ListingRetailerLocation>, CATEGORY favoirtes will return WrappedResponse< ListingCategory>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • addFavorite

        @Deprecated
public FavoriteResponse addFavorite(Long accountId,
                                      Long id,
                                      String type)
                             throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. see addFavorite(Long, Long, com.sirqul.sdk.data.Enums.FavoritableType, android.location.Location)
        Adds an offer, retailer location, or category to your favorites.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/favorites/add
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        id - the id of the object to favorite {offerLocationId, retailerLocationId, categoryId}
        type - the type of the object to favorite {OFFER, LOC, CAT}
        Returns:
        FavoriteResponse
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getFavorite

        @Deprecated
public ListingResponse getFavorite(Long accountId,
                                     Long connectionAccountId,
                                     Location location)
                            throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. see searchFavorites
        Gets all of the user's favorites.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/favorites/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        connectionAccountId - the connection account id
        location - the location
        Returns:
        ListingResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getFavorite

        public WrappedResponse<?> getFavorite(Long accountId,
                             Long favoriteId,
                             Enums.FavoritableType favoritableType,
                             Location location)
                               throws SirqulException
        Retrieves a single favorited item.

        Target API Endpoint: /favorite/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        favoriteId - The id of the favorite object you're requesting {offerId, offerLocationId, retailerLocationId, categoryId}
        favoritableType - The type of the favorite object you're requesting for {OFFER, OFFER_LOCATION, RETAILER_LOCATION, CATEGORY}
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        On invalid response: SirqulResponse. On valid response: OFFER and OFFER_LOCATION favorites will return WrappedResponse<OfferResponse>, RETAILER_LOCATION favorites will return WrappedResponse< ListingRetailerLocation>, CATEGORY favorites will return WrappedResponse< ListingCategory>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeFavorite

        public SirqulResponse removeFavorite(Long accountId,
                            Long favoriteId,
                            Long favoritableId,
                            Enums.FavoritableType favoritableType)
                              throws SirqulException
        Removes a favorited item from the user's favorites list.

        Target API Endpoint: /favorite/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        favoriteId - The ID of the favorite reference record
        favoritableId - The ID of the object to un-favorite {offerId, offerLocationId, retailerLocationId, categoryId} (this is required if favoriteId is NOT passed in)
        favoritableType - The type of the object to un-favorite {OFFER, OFFER_LOCATION, RETAILER_LOCATION, CATEGORY} (this is required if favoriteId is NOT passed in)
        Returns:
        SirqulResponse with success or error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeFavorite

        @Deprecated
public FavoriteResponse removeFavorite(Long accountId,
                                         Long id,
                                         String type)
                                throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. see removeFavorite
        Removes an offer, retailer location, or category from your favorites.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/favorites/remove
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        id - the id of the object to remove {offerLocationId, retailerLocationId, categoryId}
        type - the type of the object to remove {OFFER, LOC, CAT}
        Returns:
        FavoriteResponse
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchFavorites

        public SearchResponse<?> searchFavorites(Long accountId,
                                Long connectionAccountId,
                                Enums.FavoritableType favoritableType,
                                String keyword,
                                Enums.FavoriteApiMap sortField,
                                Boolean descending,
                                Integer start,
                                Integer limit,
                                Boolean activeOnly,
                                Location location)
                                  throws SirqulException
        Gets all of the user's favorites.

        Target API Endpoint: /favorite/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        connectionAccountId - The ID of an account the user would like to view favorites for
        favoritableType - The type of the object to favorite {OFFER, OFFER_LOCATION, RETAILER_LOCATION, CATEGORY}
        keyword - The keyword to search for
        sortField - Determines what to sort the results by {CREATED, UPDATED, DISPLAY}
        descending - Determines whether the results are in descending order
        start - The start index for pagination
        limit - The limit for pagination (there is a hard limit of 1000)
        activeOnly - Determines whether to only return active favorites
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        On invalid response: SirqulResponse. On valid response: OFFER and OFFER_LOCATION favoirtes will return SearchResponse< OfferResponse>, RETAILER_LOCATION favoirtes will return SearchResponse< ListingRetailerLocation>, CATEGORY favoirtes will return SearchResponse< ListingCategory>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
